title_teim: The sixteenth annual induction ceremony. 2001. Broadcast, parts 2-3.

label_teim: Rock and Roll Hall of Fame 16th Annual Induction Ceremony Version 2 Tape 2 of 5, Act 2 of 8/Act 3 of 8, 3/22/2001
label_ssm: Rock and Roll Hall of Fame 16th Annual Induction Ceremony Version 2 Tape 2 of 5, Act 2 of 8/Act 3 of 8, 3/22/2001
summary_teim: James Burton, Johnnie Johnson, and Ritchie Valens are inducted in the 2001 ceremony. Includes performances by Steely Dan and Ricky Martin.
summary_ssm: James Burton, Johnnie Johnson, and Ritchie Valens are inducted in the 2001 ceremony. Includes performances by Steely Dan and Ricky Martin.
contents_teim: Black Friday (Steely Dan) -- Keith Richards inducts sidemen James Burton and Johnnie Johnson -- James Burton and Johnnie Johnson accept their awards -- Come on, let's go ; Donna ; La bamba (Ricky Martin) -- Ricky Martin inducts Ritchie Valens -- The Valens family accepts his award.
contents_ssm: Black Friday (Steely Dan) -- Keith Richards inducts sidemen James Burton and Johnnie Johnson -- James Burton and Johnnie Johnson accept their awards -- Come on, let's go ; Donna ; La bamba (Ricky Martin) -- Ricky Martin inducts Ritchie Valens -- The Valens family accepts his award.

abstract_ssm: At 2001 Induction Ceremony -- Black Friday (Steely Dan with Brian May) -- Keith Richards inducts James Burton and Johnnie Johnson -- Video montage of James Burton -- Video montage of Johnnie Johnson -- James Burton accepts his award -- Johnnie Johnson accepts his award -- Ritchie valens Medley: Come On Let's Go, Donna, and La Bamba (Ricky Martin) -- Ricky Martin inducts Ritchie Valens -- Video montage of Ritchie Valens -- The family of Ritchie Valens accepts the award on his behalf
